subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Seemingly healthy horses have been dying at an alarming rate in California. In the last 16 months, seven horses under the care of the trainer Bob Baffert have died suddenly, necropsies revealed.
snippet: Seemingly healthy horses have been dying at an alarming rate in California. In the last 16 months, seven horses under the care of the trainer Bob Baffert have died suddenly, necropsies revealed.
